text: Suthan Suthersan (10 June 1956 â€“ 20 February 2017) was a Sri Lankan-American environmental engineer. He served as the Chief Technical Officer and Executive Vice President of Arcadis North America. Suthersan was born in Jaffna, Sri Lanka. He studied at the University of Peradeniya and at the University of Toronto. Suthersan died on 20 February 2017 in Hopewell Township, New Jersey, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Suthan Suthersan: A Journey from Jaffna (Dr. Suthersan's Blog) * Arcadis Mourns Loss of Chief Technical Officer Dr. Suthan S.
